messages.title: Barry Holliday - The STRONG voice for us.
messages.content: Fighting against Hard Brexit. Standing up for the NHS. Opposing school cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Barry Holliday and the Liberal Democrats want you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
The Liberal Democrats would put a penny in the pound on income tax to raise an additional £6 billion for NHS and social care.
Barry Holliday opposes the Conservative government school cuts. We will invest in schools to ensure no school loses money.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Liberal Democrats are the official opposition in Nottingham East.
